item.title: Roadhog Ability Overview | Overwatch

meta.summary:
b"I'm a one man apocalypse: http://blizz.ly/MeetRoadhog 

After taking part in a violent anti-omnic rebellion that led to nuclear disaster, the man once known as Mako Rutledge watched the Australian Outback become a wasteland. Adapting to his new environment, he donned a mask and took to the broken highways on his ramshackle chopperand the ruthless killer known as Roadhog was born. 

Roadhog uses his signature Chain Hook to pull his enemies close before shredding them with a blast from his Scrap Gun. He can heal himself by stopping to Take a Breather, and when his rage takes hold, he goes Whole Hogoverloading his Scrap Gun and knocking back foes with a stream of devastating shrapnel.

Sign Up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch"

meta.summary:
b"Welcome to the complete Roadhog 2.0 guide! I'll be showing you everything you need to know to master the new Hog, from the 4 steps of his hook combo to his newfound tanking ability to how to get those perfect right clicks! item.title: [Overwatch] 5 Minute Tips: Roadhog The "Solo Queue God" (Competitive Advice)

meta.summary:
b"The 5 minute tip series was created to provide enjoyable educational overwatch videos in easily digestible segments. I could literally go on and on about the tips relating to this video so if you have any questions, please feel free to ask in the comments below!

This Video:

Roadhog has seen some changes since I've last talked about him in a video. Most importantly, he has become extremely tanky with his damage reduction during healing. Throughout this video I will try to not only give tips on how to play Roadhog effectively, but also talk about his viability in the current meta, and why he may be a good hero for you to play to rank up.

The gameplay in this video is from a grandmaster placement game.

Please enjoy, and remember to leave a like, comment, and subscribe for more videos!"

item.title: Overwatch: ROADHOG Guide | Hero Abilities + Character Strategy | Roadhog Tips & Tricks

meta.summary:
b"Overwatch Roadhog Advanced Guide + Ability Tips, focusing on the Tank Character Roadhog, in-depth Hero guide/analysis on Roadhog's abilities and Weapons plus, strategy, tactics, tips + tricks on using them. (for PS4, Xbox One, PC) (Roadhog Gameplay Montage shown in Background)

https://youtu.be/Y4iG2jUc_SI

Overwatch: ROADHOG Guide In-Depth | Hero Abilities + Character Gameplay | Roadhog Tips & Tricks (Advanced)

Overwatch - Road hog Abilities and Weapons Analysis:

Scrap Gun

Roadhog's Scrap Gun fires short-range blasts of shrapnel with a wide spread. Alternatively, it can launch a shrapnel ball that detonates farther away, scattering metal fragments from the point of impact.

Take a Breather

Road hog restores a chunk of his health over a brief period of time.

Chain Hook

Roadhog hurls his chain at a target; if it catches, he yanks them into close range.

Ultimate Ability: Whole Hog

After cramming a top-loader onto his Scrap Gun, Roadhog pours in ammo. For a short time, he can crank out a stream of shrapnel that knocks back enemies.

All Overwatch Heroes and Characters (in Base-game) Include: Bastion, D.Va, Genji, Hanzo, Junkrat, Lucio, McCree, Mei, Mercy, Pharah, Reaper, Reinhardt, Roadhog, Soldier: 76, Symmetra, Torbjorn, Tracer, Widowmaker, Winston, Zarya and Zenyatta

(Stats and details may change overtime due to patches and updates)

item.title: Overwatch | Roadhog - Quick Start Guide

meta.summary:
b"Learn how to play Roadhog in Overwatch. Join us as we teach you all about the tips and tricks for Roadhog and his chain hook.

item.title: How GRANDMASTER Players DESTROY with Roadhog - Overwatch Top 500 PRO Tricks | HARBLEU Roadhog Vod

meta.summary:
b'Today we are watching a top 500 roadhog overwatch season 4 competitive ranked gameplay vod review with the player Harbleu who is just a wonderful roadhog player that roasts everyone with amazing flanking tactics.








Playlist:https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLefC4eOMnbRF5Xm7uCjfU73bh0ybup9Df








thumbnail:https://68.media.tumblr.com/5374ef9b648b8624d44351e3be49c37b/tumblr_o87jug5aGr1qesl2no1_500.png

video from:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wx0GjgRtHVM








What is overwatch?: Well overwatch is Blizzards new take on the fps genre. In this game you choose a hero or "Class" to take on enemies, push payloads, and take control points. The point of the game is to beat the other team over and it is indeed a whole bunch of fun to play. The game includes 24 heroes so far and Is a blast to play. In this video I mostly go over playing it in a commentary type of manner, and these types of videos will usually be overwatch live commentaries or overwatch group commentaries. As well expect a few guides of this game in the future and some box openings as well. Anyways, hope you enjoy blizzards new hit!'

Who is JoeKing aka me. Im a overwatch youtuber that likes to talk about character updates, how to get better, and the competitive community. Trying to help you get better at overwatch and entertain at the same time hopefully. How GRANDMASTER Players DESTORY with roadhog - Overwatch Top 500 PRO Tricks
